short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track influencer value on follows.app and friend.tech with SocialFi Pro

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing SocialFi Pro (powered by follows.app). Enhance your SocialFi experience with this dynamic tool designed to simplify the tracking and engagement of your favourite influencers on socialfi platforms like follows.app and friend.tech. You can effortlessly identify X (Twitter) and Farcaster users who haven't joined the new revolution of SocialFi and easily extend invitations to them. You can monitor and participate in the value growth of your preferred personalities across the top SocialFi platforms.

Step 1: Installation
Simply add the SocialFi Pro extension to your browser from the Chrome Web Store.

Step 2: Seamless Tracking
Once installed, SocialFi Pro seamlessly integrates with your X (Twitter) and Farcaster feeds. You can identify personalities and their current values with a glance, enabling you to stay informed about the latest trending people.

Step 3: Informed Decision-Making
Instantly view the market value of existing socialfi users on follows.app and friend.tech,. Make empowered decisions about engaging with fellow users and maximise your earnings potential.

Step 4: Easy Engagement
With a simple click, you can also invite friends to join the SocialFi Platform follows.app. Extend a warm invitation to potential new members directly from their X (Twitter) and Farcaster posts.

Step 5: Amplify Your Earnings
Maximize your earning potential with follows.appâ€™s' amazing referral program! Earn a 1% referral bonus on all future transactions made by users you've referred.
